about_the_game:
This DLC is currently not available within the Unreal Table Ball Demo

The Table Ball Deluxe Edition includes the base game, and several extra features.

Gain exclusive content by purchasing this extra special DLC.

HEX Code colour's

Change your balls and bumpers into whatever colour you WANT.

100 Pings

This'll allow you to purchase all the "skins" currently within the game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2330M
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: None
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8145U
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Quadro 2000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: None
